name: MergeTasksInClickup
description:
Merge multiple tasks into a target task in ClickUp.

Use this tool to merge several tasks into a specified target task within ClickUp. The target task is identified by the task_id, with source tasks provided in the request. This is useful when consolidating tasks for better project management.

parameters.name: target_task_id
parameters.description: ID of the target task into which other tasks will be merged.

value_schema.description: ID of the target task that other tasks will be merged into.

parameters.name: source_task_ids_to_merge
parameters.description: Array of task IDs to merge into the target task in ClickUp.

value_schema.description: Array of task IDs to merge into the target task.
